note: Childbearing age is defined by the authors as 15â€“49 years old, and the average survival across the age range is used.
title: Fertility rate accounting for survival until childbearing age
subtitle: While the [total fertility rate](#dod:fertility-rate) considers all births, this measure of the effective fertility rate considers how many children per woman are expected to survive to childbearing age, using historical data and projections of mortality rates.
